THE IRA SINGLES EVENT PRESENTS:

A DAY AT THE WORLD’S BEST ZOO AND COOLEST PLACE IN AMERICA!!!!!!!!!!

Sunday, October 4.


DETAILS:

A Beautiful Bus Ride to the Bronx Zoo. Our gorgeous bus accommodates 52 Fun- Loving Folks. Relax and enjoy the fun ride on comfy seats, with WIFI, DVD, and almost a bathroom, highlighted with Gold and Marble inlay flooring and faucets. (OK, maybe you have to use your imagination). Think no pit stops at crowded rest areas.

Our trip will begin rain or shine at one of three convenient pick up places. Exact times, pick up/drop off locations will be announced.

Hartford/Chowder Pot Area- 9:30
New Haven Area- 10:15
Stamford Area- 11:00

Bronx Zoo arrival in the 12:15ish Range.

Lunch: Brown Bag, or eat at the Zoo Cafeteria Areas.

We will be at the Zoo until about 4:30, and then leaving for Greenwich Village- How cool is this? Enjoy Fine or Funky Dining, Shopping, People Watching.

Greenwich Village arrival around 5:30—Play time till about 9 p.m., for a great ride back home. Exact Departure times to be announced.

The Zoo is most wonderful.

Open All Year:
Congo Gorilla Forest
Congo Gorilla Forest is a 6.5 acre African rainforest habitat for 400 animals of 55 species, including one of the largest breeding populations of western lowland gorillas in North America
Bug Carousel
Come and see our first-of-its-kind insect carousel! You can ride on of ten enormous representations of the insect world, including a long-legged praying mantis, a brightly colored grasshopper, a rounded ladybug, a formidable bombardier beetle, or an endearing firefly. The 76-seat fully accessible carousel is a year-round blast!
Butterfly Garden
The Butterfly Garden allows visitors experience the wonder of butterflies flying freely as well as an assortment of many other “backyard bugs’ in a fantastical setting of winding planted paths, a greenhouse and a “secret garden” filled with interpretive sculptures, artwork and plants.
Zoo Shuttle One-way ground transportation on a train that takes you from one side of the park to the other. Pay once, ride all day. Seniors (65 and over) ride free.
Open May – October:
Wild Asia Monorail Experience our 20 minute tour abroad the monorail where you will see rare Asian wildlife such as tigers, rhinos and elephants – plus little known creatures such as sambars, barasinghas and barbirusas.
Greenwich Village
Pease see: http://www.nycgv.com/...
Big Print Details:
COST: One low Price of $45 includes Upscale Bus, Bronx Zoo Total Experience Admission Ticket Package, Light Snacks on the bus, and “Entertainment” provided by The Ira. Regular Total Bronx Zoo Total Experience Admission alone is $27 – this trip is a great deal!
Limited to a total of 52 fun-loving folks. Please share with friends so we can fill the bus for a fabulous, adventure-filled fall day trip. A second bus will be added if we get an additional 52 people.
RSVP no later than September 13. I need to have your check for a confirmed yes by this date as well.
If we do not meet the 52, all checks will be returned.
RSVP to: Mistrchrming@aol.com Questions- 860-604-5792. Checks to be sent to:
Ira Wettenstein, 44 Dibble Hollow Lane, Windsor Locks CT. 06096
